articles.content: The Detroit Tigers will battle the Texas Rangers at the start of a four-game in Texas on Monday night. The Tigers come in after losing two of three at home to the Twins over the weekend. Texas, meanw… [+3903 chars]

articles.title: Quinn Simmons earns solo victory at US Pro Road Race Nationals - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Tyler Williams trails for silver while Tyler Stites outsprints Brandon McNulty for bronze
articles.content: Quinn Simmons (Trek-Segafredo) rode solo to his first elite men’s title at US Pro Road Race National Championships Sunday afternoon. Tyler Williams (L39ION of Los Angeles), who had ridden most of the… [+3801 chars]

articles.author: Liz Roscher
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz regains No. 1 ranking over Novak Djokovic with first grass court championship - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Alcaraz regains his No. 1 ranking just one week before Wimbledon.
articles.content:
Carlos Alcaraz is proving that his prodigious talent translates to any surface.
Alcaraz won the Queen's Club Championships on Sunday, defeating Aussie Alex de Minaur 6-4, 6-4 to win his first grass-… [+1644 chars]

articles.description: The Angels wrap up their weekend series against the Rockies with both teams looking to improve from rough stretches.
articles.content: The Angels have been carried by their lineup and both teams look to drive in runs from the first pitch. The Rockies should drive in runs at will against Tyler Anderson, who has allowed 11 runs in the… [+495 chars]
